title: U.S. unveils tariffs on $50 billion worth of Chinese imports
text:
U.S. unveils tariffs on $50 billion worth of Chinese imports 1:10pm IST - 00:55 
The Trump administration on Tuesday raised the stakes in a growing trade showdown with China, announcing 25 percent tariffs on some 1,300 industrial technology, transport and medical products to try to force changes in Beijing's intellectual property practices. Justin Mitchell reports.

Justin Mitchell reports.  //reut.rs/2q4kWJa
